properties.title: Concierge OSGi - An optimized OSGi R3 implementation for mobile and embedded systems - Concierge on J2SE
properties.author: Jan S. Rellermeyer

meta.name: description
meta.content: Concierge is an optimized OSGi R3 implementation with a minimal file and memory footprint, which makes it ideal for small and embedded devices.

section.name: Concierge on J2SE x86, SPARC and PowerPC
section.p: Concierge has been tested with Sun J2SE 1.4.2, Sun J2SE 1.5, Sun J2SE 1.6 Beta, Blackdown JVM, JamVM and SableVM on different architectures. Since Concierge is less liberal with the resources, the test setups could win some performance in most cases, compared to existing OSGi framework implementations.
